name: Wild Deer Hunt-ing Survival Pixel World 2016 - Mini Hunter
name_original: Wild Deer Hunt-ing Survival Pixel World 2016 - Mini Hunter
description: BEAUTIFUL gigantic pixel world game with an open world game play. Explore the epic pixel island by deer hunting or the survival arena of the deep almost endless wolf, bear, and lava filled mine caves. Be the deer pixel survival hunter you always dreamed of. This awesome deer hunter game has cool lakes and waterfalls. A wonderful looking place if you like fps hunting and fishing games. If your into dino hunting, duck hunt or any survival craft games or even pixel building games, were sure you will enjoy our environment and game play. Have fun and enjoy your adventure quest for the big trophy deer!
